department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: Developing software-defined Independent Zonal Positioning System (IZPS)
goal.ch: 本專題研究計畫將開發自主區域定位系統 (Independent Zonal Positioning System, IZPS)軟體收發機用以建置小區域型自主定位系統。申請者需熟悉C電腦語言與基本電磁波學識。

content.en:
1. Developing software-defined Independent Zonal Positioning System (IZPS)
2. Teaching basic C-language program
3. Teaching basic electromagnetic wave theories

3.教授基本電磁波學識。
